PackageOracle.name: DA_CUSTOMER_LOGIN_EQUIPMENT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CUSTOMER_LOGIN_EQUIPMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.49.424377000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,customer_login_id IN NUMBER
,customer_equipment_nickname IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,customer_login_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_customer_login_equipment;

body.name: DA_CUSTOMER_LOGIN_EQUIPMENT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CUSTOMER_LOGIN_EQUIPMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.49.434247000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,customer_login_id IN NUMBER
,customer_equipment_nickname IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer_login_equipment.add, parms=' || equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || customer_login_id || '|' || customer_equipment_nickname || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_customer_login_equipment a
(
a.equip_prod_inst_id
,a.customer_login_id
,a.customer_equipment_nickname
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.equip_prod_inst_id
,add.customer_login_id
,add.customer_equipment_nickname
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer_login_equipment.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,customer_login_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer_login_equipment.del, parms=' || equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || customer_login_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_customer_login_equipment a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.equip_prod_inst_id = del.equip_prod_inst_id
AND a.customer_login_id = del.customer_login_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer_login_equipment.del');

END del;

END da_customer_login_equipment;
